alert.note: Alert for Charles City; James City; Prince George; Surry; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 1:57PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Charles City, northeastern Prince George, west central York, southwestern James City, and northwestern Surry Counties and the City of Williamsburg through 245 PM EDT... At 157 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cabin Point, or near Claremont, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Claremont around 205 PM EDT. Rustic around 215 PM EDT. Jamestown around 230 PM EDT. College Of William And Mary, Toano and Kings Point around 235 PM EDT. Williamsburg, Norge and Carver Gardens around 240 PM EDT. York Terrace around 245 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Ewell, Taylors Corner, Water Country U.S.A., Governors Land, Warren Mill, Brandon, Oaktree, Lightfoot, Williamsburg Airport and Centerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; James City; Prince George; Surry; York
